Launcher¶

Launches the Sherlock gRPC server and a Sherlock client.

Module for launching Sherlock locally or connecting to a local instance with gRPC.

ansys.sherlock.launcher.launcher.launch_sherlock(*sherlock_args, host='127.0.0.1', port=9090)¶

Launches Sherlock and starts gRPC on the given port.

Parameters

  • sherlock_args (list, optional) – A list of optional sherlock command arguments, i.e. -singleProject

  • host (str, required) – The hostname in internet domain notation or an IPv4 address

  • port (integer, required) – The socket port number to use for the connection

Examples

>>> from ansys.sherlock.launcher import launcher
>>> launch_sherlock()

>>> from ansys.sherlock.launcher import launcher
>>> launch_sherlock(port=9092)
